text: Limbergo Taccola (born January 1, 1928 in Viareggio) was an Italian professional football player. He played 1 game in the Serie A in the 1949/50 season for A.S. Roma. Taccola suffered a serious injury during an automobile accident while playing with Pisa S.C. and had to retire from playing football. Taccola died in November 2003. ==References== Category:1928 births Category:2003 deaths Category:Italian footballers Category:Serie A players Category:A.S. Roma players Category:S.S. title: Limbergo Taccola
